mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (email, password, name) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{name})
mapper.select: SELECT member_id, email, password, role, name, profile_image, used_storage, created_at, modified_at, is_deleted, main_badge_id, max_storage FROM member WHERE member_id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET password = #{requestDto.password}, name = #{requestDto.name}, profile_image = #{requestDto.profileImage}, main_badge_id = #{requestDto.mainBadgeId} WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
UPDATE member SET is_deleted = TRUE WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT m.max_storage, COALESCE(SUM(f.size), 0) AS used_storage FROM member m LEFT JOIN file f ON m.member_id = f.member_id WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId} GROUP BY m.max_storage;
